title: Solc srcmap and sources incoherent

body: This source index references the internally generated utility file, please see the third paragraph in https://docs.soliditylang.org/en/latest/internals/source_mappings.html
I can't find them in `output['contracts'][sourceName][contractName]['evm']['bytecode']['generatedSources']` as mentioned in the third paragraph, generatedSources give `[]`
Can you provide the full standard-json input you are using?
Can you provide the standard-json INPUT you are using? I would like to reproduce the issue. What you quoted above is the output.
